conclusion: Analyze current positions of shadows and shift based on new light source direction
Shadow A is cast by the cake, located to the left of the cake
Shadow B is cast by the nail, located below the nail
Shadow C is cast by the roll of paper, located to the left of the roll
Shadow D is cast by the ring, located below the ring
Light source moves to the back right, coming from the top-right corner
Shadow A will move to the front-left of the cake due to light from back-right
Shadow A may become slightly larger as it stretches further due to light angle
Shadow B will move to the front-left of the nail due to light from back-right
Shadow B may become slightly larger and more elongated
Shadow C will move to the front-left of the roll due to light from back-right
Shadow C may become slightly larger and more elongated
Shadow D will move to the front-left of the ring due to light from back-right
Shadow D may become slightly larger and more elongated
Final answer: Shadows A, B, C, and D will move to the front-left and may become larger and more elongated
